subject: commande :SF3295149093814
description_text:
bonjour ,
j ai fait une commande chez vous ,j' ai reçue Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
- the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback , mais je n ais pas
recue Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional
Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 / without Baseplateet j ai du payer 61.22 EUR de frais de
douane , pouvez vous m expliquer les raisons merci cdlt

conversations.body_text: Hi jacky romeuf,  We apologize, but the product is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We have shipped it to you separately. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3295149093814

et pour les frais de douane ? ont fait comment
merci
cdlt

Le lun. 8 déc. 2025 à 10:32, service@simsonn.com

Hi jacky romeuf,    We apologize, but the pedals are currently out of stock at our German warehouse. Shipping from China will incur customs duties. Please provide your invoice after payment, and we will reimburse you for a portion of the duties.

je vous remercie pour ce geste commercial
merci
cdlt

Le lun. 8 déc. 2025 à 11:12, service@simsonn.com
